Projects Involved

YODA (Your Open Data)

(September 2020 - ) professional active

Service for the European citizens that allows them to create personalised dashboards binding several sources of data through a single application. It includes data processing infrastructure that, on the basis of real time and machine learning processing, will provide additional processed results and predictions to the developed personalised service.

Europen Project linked-open data Machine learning

A/RPorTwin

(January 2020 - ) professional active

Development of an Airport Digital Twin tested in the Arberdreen International Airport. FIWARE is the reference technology used for the communication among all the components. The objective is generalize and standardize tasks in airport management.

Digital Twin FIWARE Aeronautics

FIWARE Draco/NIFI TCP client

(November 2020 - ) personal active

Nifi processor available for Draco that implements a customizable TCP client including security layers (TLS/SSL). It allows customizable configurations for unwrapping received packets and the possibility to send a message when the connection was stablished. The client remains open receiving data form the server.

Nifi Draco TCP Client TLS/SSL

ProgDoc

(March 2018 - July 2021) professional finished

Educational scheduling service of all ETSIT-UPM's degrees. It includes the life-cycle management of groups, staff, calendar, schedules, exams, departments and teaching.

digitalization educational scheduling Node.js
